name: Grand Hotel San Marino

reviews.text: The Grand Hotel San Marino is near the top of Mt. Titano and it takes a while to climb the hill. Parking is adequate in the area. The views are spectacular from the top. You can see the beaches of Rimini and the valleys to the west. Service at this hotel was impeccable and the rooms were very nice.
reviews.title: Getting There is Half the Fun

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: San Marino is a lovely combination of old and ancient. The view from this far up the mountain is breathtaking. Nice location with lovely little shops all around. Once again, horrible hard mattresses...but a lovely old hotel...
reviews.title: Beautiful location

reviews.text: Hotel is located at the top of the mountain right by the old town, the views are amazing & everything was so close- all walking distant.
reviews.title: good location but old hotel

reviews.text: Hotel has a garage at the end of the road, you have to drive down a steep road to get into the tiny car park, I think it is shared with another hotel.
reviews.title: Very nice Hotel

reviews.text: I would suggest to just leave your keys with Grand Hotel & have them valet park the car, It costs 16€ a day
reviews.title: acceptable hotel in a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One of our best experiences in out road trip to Italy. Extremely friendly manager and staff, almost reasonably priced (135 euros/night + 12euros parking/night), great location a few meters from the old city, nice breakfast and nice view. Free wi-fi in the lobby, expensive wired internet in the rooms.
reviews.title: Definetly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is no more than average, it was clean and the room called panoramic faces the front of the hotel with a mountian view, romm not so big. They are stuck in the 80's . Our car came up from their garage damaged,they clained the did not do ir but the garage is so small with lots of poles.The first night we ate in their rest. a fixed price menu and they nerver brought desert or wine, charged us full peice and charged 6E for two coffees. Overall it. not an exciting place to stay, except they are close to the inner city. While it was nor a bad stay it was no more than a lower 4 star hotelsm there are much nicer newer fir the same price.
reviews.title: Average 1979 style

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were impressed with the location & views from this hotel! Everything was very clean & comfy. Staff were friendly & helpful.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel, good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We drove 7,000km around Europe and stayed in many hotels throughout our travels. When you have a car, it can be a bit tricky getting parking - no problems here as they have their own car park & valet service. The staff were lovely, the location was brilliant - just a short walk to the centre of town and the views.....stunning!! Our room overlooked the countryside and watching the sunset over San Marino is a vision we'll always cherish. The spa on the deck was a great surprise and we relaxed in the sun room, feeling like we were on top of the world. The food was lovely and the dinner particularly was excellent. Highly recommended, particularly for those travellers with a car as there is nowhere to park in this gorgeous little town! We fell in love with San Marino and will definitely return.
reviews.title: Breathtaking views, perfect location - a San Marino gem!

reviews.text: The Grand Hotel San Marino has no more facilities than a two-star hotel. It offers a free breakfast, and has a refrigerator in the room. That is all. And yet it has a four-star rating without a gym, swimming pool, etc. How ? There is a private spa on the 3rd floor which offers sauna, hydromassage, face peelings, manicures, etc., but they charge the same exorbitant prices for guests that they charge for anyone off the street (eg. $35 for a sauna !). In other words, this business has nothing to do with the hotel. But it gets included in the hotel's ratings. As a result, you pay for a 4-star hotel here, but get only a 2-star hotel. I wouldn't pay more than 50 Euros for this hotel.
reviews.title: Overpriced hotel which is really only 2 stars, not four

reviews.text: The interior - including the bedrooms - could maybe do with a bit of modernisation, but it's still perfectly acceptable. Breakfast is good. There's a fabulous view from the front.
reviews.title: Good position, with garage

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One very good thing about the hotel is the garage for guests. You drive down the ramp at the back, give your keys to the attendant waiting there, then just forget about the car until you need it again. It won't be of much use actually in San Marino.
reviews.title: Great hotel! We definitely recommend it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Grand Hotel San Marino was absolutely fantastic. The staff were pleasant though not overly friendly. Our bags were brought to our room… and what a delight it was when we opened the door. The room was so large, clean and new! Impeccable décor and lighting, a complimentary fruit bowl with a welcome message beside it and on the television screen a welcome message with our names on it. The television boasted music playlists to choose from, news, and other things. We did think it offered a selection of movies but as it turned out they only had a large selection of pornographic movies to choose from, nothing else. None the less we didn’t need television… we had the room to enjoy. Our own balcony overlooking beautiful views of the landscapes of San Marino, massive comfortable bed, and incredible bathroom. The shower is wonderful, you don’t want to get out of the shower it’s so good. Another bonus was the minibar, The Grand Hotel San Marino offers the best bottled water we found in our entire trip of Italy, TVLLIA. Finally a minibar with some delicious bottled water!
reviews.title: Great Hotel in the center of town. Wheelchair accessable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast room is huge with a very wide variety of breakfast foods and drinks, again the room has lovely décor.
reviews.title: Would stay again for sure

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: They do have wifi which we made the most of also. The lobby has a beautiful view also and it is nice to sit there and take that view in too if you get the chance. They have a corridor which glass cabinets all the way along it that house examples of souvenirs’ and other luxuries available for purchase at the hotel.
reviews.title: Booked Titano and got switched to Grand - terrible
Nothing "Grand" about this Hotel!
reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel in late March 2012. I had thought that this would be one of the best if not, the best hotel in San Marino. Much to my dismay, it was short on almost everything and I cannot understand how this hotel can be rated as a "4 star" property.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First, the positive - the only good thing going for it is its location. Near enough to the key sites in San Marino and the Congress Centre.
reviews.title: Great location for an overnight stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is undergoing some "facelift" and hence, it is dusty and quite frankly, noisy especially in the daytime. The rooms are old, with stained carpets and upholstry. Maintenance is minimal and you can tell that the housekeeping is sloppy.
reviews.title: Please don't go

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The reception staff are nothing short of rude and careless, except one particular person who was most helpful. As the Internet access was cut on one of the days, when I asked if anything could be done, the receptionist very pointedly replied "no"! So much for service.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was also quite bad - poor service and we observed only one waiter to deal with all the customers in the restaurant!
reviews.title: Trip to San Marino

aka: Grand Hotel San Marino City Of San Marino
description: Grand Hotel San Marino enjoys a central position in the centre of San Marino, with a wellness centre, a restaurant where the hotel can also organize banquets and receptions, an American cocktail bar, panoramic terrace with Jacuzzi and sun-beds, a conference centre with 3 meeting rooms and a private parking area. A few steps from the historic centre, the Grand Hotel San Marino is not only a place where to spend an enjoyable holiday, but also the ideal place for business meetings.
